data.actual_result: You get a generic 500: Internal Server Error message
data.expected_result: You're given a message saying debit cards aren't supported
data.short_description: Setting a Debit card as your default payment method causes an internal server error
data.steps_to_repro: - Add a debit card to your account - Check the box "Make this payment method my default" when editing the card details - Click Save
